DOC.brief_summary: The purpose multisite randomize control trial ( RCT ) compare short-term ( 6 week ) long-term ( 6 month ) effect chiropractic care combine specific nutritional supplement regimen chiropractic care placebo supplement patient ankle sprain , term improvement physical function pain .
DOC.brief_title: Chiropractic Care Specific Regimen Nutritional Supplementation Patients With Acute Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim 1 : compare short-term ( 6 week ) effect chiropractic care combine specific nutritional supplement regimen chiropractic care placebo nutritional supplement patient ankle sprain , term speed amount improvement physical function pain . Our hypothesis chiropractic care plus nutritional supplement design supply necessary nutrient ligament heal improve outcome pain disability , compare chiropractic care plus placebo . We use Foot Ankle Ability Measure Activities Daily Living Subscale ( FAAM ADLS ) measure outcome . Specific aim 2 : compare long-term ( 6 month ) effect chiropractic care combine specific nutritional supplement regimen chiropractic care placebo nutritional supplement patient ankle sprain , term speed amount improvement physical function pain . Our hypothesis chiropractic care plus nutritional supplement design supply necessary nutrient ligament heal improve outcome measure FAAM ADLS , compare chiropractic care plus placebo . Specific aim 3 : explore change attitude , knowledge behavior chiropractic intern practitioner role nutrition treat musculoskeletal injury , pre- post-intervention . We also compare response population student practitioner participate project , comparison group .
DOC.criteria: Acute ankle sprain , define ankle sprain within past 7 day , patient report . Treating clinician verify diagnosis via clinical examination . Ages 1850 ; ankle sprain common age group . Diagnosis grade III ankle sprain , fracture dislocation ; fracture diagnose use Ottawa ankle rules11,12 Contraindications chiropractic care , fracture abnormality find history , examination , xrays , determine treat supervise clinician . Pregnancy : although unlikely nutritional supplement would adverse effect fetus , exclude pregnant woman safeguard . Unwilling unable regularly take supplement ( e.g. , vegetarian ; know sensitivity selfreport ; patient show ingredient list prior sign informed consent ) . Litigation healthrelated claim ( process pending ) . History ankle surgery presence ankle hardware ( pin , screw , etc . ) , patient report . History diabetic peripheral neuropathy , patient report . Current use prescription nonprescription medication may interact experimental placebo supplement , patient report .
